long_description: The full-size and strong Blackburn Folsom U-lock uses a hexagonal shackle shape and dual-bolt design to supply security for your bike. 14mm-thick steel shackle features a hexagonal shape to prevent the shackle from spinning, increasing resistance to cutting and leverage attacks. Dual-bolt lock mechanism engages the shackles on both ends to maximize bump- and pick-resistance. Lining helps protect your bike's finish from scratches and scuffs. The Blackburn Folsom U-lock comes with 3 laser-cut keys and a mounting bracket.
short_description: The full-size and strong Blackburn Folsom U-lock uses a hexagonal shackle shape and dual-bolt design to supply security for your bike.
